kinetic.client.p2p

Class PeerToPeerOperation

  • java.lang.Object
    • kinetic.client.p2p.PeerToPeerOperation

  • public class PeerToPeerOperation
extends java.lang.Object
    Peer to peer operation request/response specification API.

    A Kinetic peer to peer client specifies its peer with setPeer(Peer) and its operations with addOperation(Operation) methods.

    The current connected host is the communication party (peer one) with the peer (peer two) specified with setPeer(Peer) API.

    The overall response status getStatus() is set by the Kinetic service based on the result of all operations.

    Each individual operation status is set in the corresponding Operation added with the addOperation(Operation) method.

    Author:
    chiaming
    See Also:
    Operation, Peer

      • getStatus

        public boolean getStatus()
        Get overall status for the P2P operation.

        Each operation's status can be obtained with Operation.getStatus() API.

        Returns:
        true if all operations are succeeded. Otherwise, return false.
